name: WallJump
setup: Platforming setup where the agent must get over a wall; a movable block can be used as a step for high walls.
goal: Reach the goal area on the other side of the wall.

agents.description: Single agent with different difficulty modes depending on wall height.

terms: +1.0 when the agent reaches the goal.
-1.0 if the agent falls off the platform.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Ray-based observation plus some global information (position and grounded flag).
behavior_parameters.actions: 4 discrete branches: move forward/back, rotate left/right, strafe, and jump.
